main.name: Gabriel Dias
main.description: I am an ex-athlete, web developer looking for opportunities in the tech industry. I have been studying and programming for a year. This is my portfolio website, here you can get to know more about my self and the projects I have worked on.
main.bio: Strong motivation and work ethic achieved through a major academic performance, competitive college sport, and work experience.  It is time to challenge myself and dive to a new industry.
main.contactmessage: Please, do not hesitate to get in touch. I am looking for opportunities in Web Development.

resume.skillmessage: Below are the technologies I have learnt by the moment.

education.description: The decision to go to college in US was quite challenging, move to another country not knowing the native language, the sport gave me the strenght to complete the mission...

education.school: CICCC Cornerstone International Community College of Canada
education.description: I had no background in coding before starting this course. The technology I liked the most during the program is React. Also, I learned during quarantine WordPress/PHP
